title.narrative: Water Supply and Environmental Sanitation in Hajjah Governorate (Phase III)

description.narrative: Providing and maintaining water tanks and their surroundings, safety of sewage tanks, preventing leaks and toilets, maintaining a safe and sound environment, and sustaining project activities with their periodic maintenance. Provides designated places to put waste, collect and dispose of it in a safe, environmentally healthy way, while limiting the spread of rodents and disease vectors, and spreading awareness among the displaced in a clean healthy environment for (28,742) beneficiaries.

Saving life, maintaining its continuity, limiting the spread of diseases and epidemics, and ensuring a safe, healthy and safe environment for the displaced and citizens by providing basic services in the water and environmental sanitation sector through the maintenance of wells and pumps and the establishment of a desalination plant for drinking water

Securing safe and healthy water sources in the areas of gathering for the displaced in Hajjah Governorate (Hayran / Midi / Abs) / Safe and healthy disposal of waste and waste / Preventive maintenance of water tanks, sewage and toilets
